observe_field_with_dojo(field_id, options = {}) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/drails/prototype_helper.rb, line 79
79:     def observe_field_with_dojo(field_id, options = {})
80:       if options[:frequency] && options[:frequency] > 0
81:         build_observer('drails.Form.Element.Observer', field_id, options)
82:       else
83:         build_observer('drails.Form.Element.EventObserver', field_id, options)
84:       end
85:     end

    # File lib/drails/prototype_helper.rb, line 87
87:     def observe_form_with_dojo(form_id, options = {})
88:       if options[:frequency]
89:         build_observer('drails.Form.Observer', form_id, options)
90:       else
91:         build_observer('drails.Form.EventObserver', form_id, options)
92:       end
93:     end
periodically_call_remote_with_dojo(options = {}) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/drails/prototype_helper.rb, line 34
34:     def periodically_call_remote_with_dojo(options = {})
35:      frequency = options[:frequency] || 10 # every ten seconds by default
36:      code = "new drails.PeriodicalExecuter(function() {#{remote_function(options)}}, #{frequency})"
37:      javascript_tag(code)
38:     end
remote_function_with_dojo(options) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/drails/prototype_helper.rb, line 40
40:     def remote_function_with_dojo(options)
41:       javascript_options = options_for_ajax(options)
42: 
43:       update = ''
44:       if options[:update] && options[:update].is_a?(Hash)
45:         update  = []
46:         update << "success:'#{options[:update][:success]}'" if options[:update][:success]
47:         update << "failure:'#{options[:update][:failure]}'" if options[:update][:failure]
48:         update  = '{' + update.join(',') + '}'
49:       elsif options[:update]
50:         update << "'#{options[:update]}'"
51:       end
52: 
53:       function = update.empty? ?
54:         "new drails.Request(" :
55:         "new drails.Updater(#{update}, "
56: 
57:       url_options = options[:url]
58:       url_options = url_options.merge(:escape => false) if url_options.is_a?(Hash)
59:       function << "'#{escape_javascript(url_for(url_options))}'"
60:       function << ", #{javascript_options})"
61: 
62:       function = "#{options[:before]}; #{function}" if options[:before]
63:       function = "#{function}; #{options[:after]}"  if options[:after]
64:       function = "if (#{options[:condition]}) { #{function}; }" if options[:condition]
65:       function = "if (confirm('#{escape_javascript(options[:confirm])}')) { #{function}; }" if options[:confirm]
66: 
67:       return function
68:     end
submit_to_remote_with_dojo(name, value, options = {}) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/drails/prototype_helper.rb, line 70
70:     def submit_to_remote_with_dojo(name, value, options = {})
71:       options[:with] ||= 'dojo.formToQuery(this.form)'
72: 
73:       html_options = options.delete(:html) || {}
74:       html_options[:name] = name
75: 
76:       button_to_remote(value, options, html_options)
77:     end

options_for_ajax_with_dojo(options) click to toggle source 
     # File lib/drails/prototype_helper.rb, line 97
 97:     def options_for_ajax_with_dojo(options)
 98:       js_options = build_callbacks(options)
 99: 
100:       js_options['asynchronous'] = options[:type] != :synchronous
101:       js_options['method']       = method_option_to_s(options[:method]) if options[:method]
102:       js_options['insertion']    = "'#{options[:position].to_s.downcase}'" if options[:position]
103:       js_options['evalScripts']  = options[:script].nil? || options[:script]
104: 
105:       if options[:form]
106:         js_options['parameters'] = 'dojo.formToQuery(this)'
107:       elsif options[:submit]
108:         js_options['parameters'] = "dojo.formToQuery('#{options[:submit]}')"
109:       elsif options[:with]
110:         js_options['parameters'] = options[:with]
111:       end
112: 
113:       if protect_against_forgery? && !options[:form]
114:         if js_options['parameters']
115:           js_options['parameters'] << " + '&"
116:         else
117:           js_options['parameters'] = "'"
118:         end
119:         js_options['parameters'] << "#{request_forgery_protection_token}=' + encodeURIComponent('#{escape_javascript form_authenticity_token}')"
120:       end
121: 
122:       options_for_javascript(js_options)
123:     end
